text:
The Latin Wikipedia (In Latin: Vicipaedia or "Vicipaedia Latina") is the Latin language edition of Wikipedia. Started in May 2002, this edition had over 80,000 articles as of October 2012.
As of October 2015, it is the 47th largest edition of Wikipedia by number of articles.
"Vicipaedia" is the largest Wikipedia in a dead language, (a language that is no longer anyone's mother tongue).
